DOC.brief_summary: The aim is to find the presence of anti vitamin D antibodies in scleroderma patients and compare with control. A second goal is anti vitamin D levels in serum of scleroderma patients in relation to the clinical manifestations of the disease.
DOC.brief_title: Empirical Comparative Study of Variation Blood Level Antibody Vitamin D at Scleroderma (SSc) Patients Compared Healthy Peoples
DOC.detailed_description: Blood samples from 30 scleroderma patients compared to 30 healthy peoples to reach the target of variation of the blood level vitamin D antibody between this groups
DOC.criteria: study group 1. patients with SSc 2. age 18 years old and older 3. sign ICF control group healthy people
